item.title: Adding dialogue to 637?
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Well, I know how to add the dialogue however, when I press ‘Click here to continue’ it gets stuck on ‘Please wait…’.
Be glad if you help.

Code:

			case 3637:
				sendDialogue(player, HAPPY_TALKING, id, 2832, "Greetings adventurer, I can teleport you to skilling areas.");
				return true;
		case 2832:
			sendOptionDialogue(player, new int[]{2833, 2834, 2835, 2836, 2837, 2838, -1}, "Runite Ore (2)", "The 'Multi-Rocks'", "Crystal Mines", "Summoning Room", "Camelot", "I'll pass.");
			return true;
		case 2833:
			TeleportHandler.telePlayer(player, 3076, 3897, 0, 0, 0, false, 1712);
			return false;
		case 2834:
			TeleportHandler.telePlayer(player, 3063, 3951, 0, 0, 0, false, 1712);
			return false;
		case 2835:
			TeleportHandler.telePlayer(player, 2792, 4427, 0, 0, 0, false, 1712);
			return false;
		case 2836:
			TeleportHandler.telePlayer(player, 2209, 5348, 0, 0, 0, false, 1712);
			return false;
		case 2837:
			TeleportHandler.telePlayer(player, 2757, 3477, 0, 0, 0, false, 1712);
			return false;

-Arham
